text: Eileen Kramer (8 November 1914 - 15 November 2024) was an Australian dancer, artist, performer, choreographer and supercentenarian. Kramer was born in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia. Kramer began her career by performing with the Bodenwieser Ballet in 1940. She toured around Australia, France and the United States for the next 60 years, before returning to Australia where she remained active in the arts until her death. Kramer died on 15 November 2024 in New South Wales, a week after her 110th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * One Plus One - ABC News * The Art of Now: Breath is Life - Eileen Kramer - BBC Radio 4 * Studio 10 interview - YouTube Category:1914 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Supercentenarians Category:Australian dancers Category:Australian choreographers Category:Artists from New South Wales Category:Writers from Sydney Category:Ballerinas
title: Eileen Kramer
